comics.title: Batman: The Long Halloween
comics.author: Loeb
comics.description: A thrilling mystery set during Batman's early years as a crimefighter, where he investigates a series of murders on holidays.

comics.title: Spiderman: Entre los muertos
comics.author: Millar
comics.description: Spiderman faces a deadly threat when a powerful villain returns from the dead seeking revenge.

comics.title: Infinity Gauntlet
comics.author: Jim Starlin
comics.description: Thanos possesses the all-powerful Infinity Gauntlet and wreaks havoc across the universe, challenging the mightiest heroes to stop him.

comics.title: Venom
comics.author: Cates
comics.description: Eddie Brock becomes bonded with an alien symbiote, granting him incredible powers as the anti-hero Venom.

comics.title: Batman 89
comics.author: Quinones
comics.description: A new story set in the world of Tim Burton's Batman film, continuing the Dark Knight's adventures in Gotham City.

comics.title: Superman
comics.author: Bill Finger
comics.description: Superman, also known as Clark Kent, is a Kryptonian superhero with incredible powers who fights for truth, justice, and the American way.

comics.title: El ocaso de los dioses
comics.author: Francis Baker
comics.description: La muerte de la liga de la justicia
